channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Returns to CES 2018
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Dori! Thanks for reaching out. Right now, we don't have plans to attend WWDC. If you haven't already, be sure to subscribe to our email newsletter so you can hear about events Kuri will be attending in the future! /#NewsletterPopup
item.content:encoded: Hi Dori! Thanks for reaching out. Right now, we don’t have plans to attend WWDC. If you haven’t already, be sure to subscribe to our email newsletter so you can hear about events Kuri will be attending in the future! /#NewsletterPopup

item.title: By: Dori Nussbaum
item.dc:creator: Dori Nussbaum
item.description: Will you be in attendance at WWDC? And with the success of Kuri, I’m interested in other designs. I’m enthralled.
item.content:encoded: Will you be in attendance at WWDC? And with the success of Kuri, I’m interested in other designs. I’m enthralled.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Frank! Thanks for letting us know. The videos have been fixed.
item.content:encoded: Hi Frank! Thanks for letting us know. The videos have been fixed.

item.title: By: Frank engelman
item.dc:creator: Frank engelman
item.description: The first two CES 2018 videos have no sound
item.content:encoded: The first two CES 2018 videos have no sound
